body_html:
I've been emailing Martin Wicke and Magnus Hyttsten. drpngx on the boards recommended that I make it a feature request. I've attached the conversation: That will put everything (depending on where you put the device statement) on the CPU, but not necessarily on the right worker. If it works for you, great, but it may not be doing what you want.
…

I've been emailing Martin Wicke and Magnus Hyttsten. drpngx on the boards
recommended that I make it a feature request.

I've attached the conversation:

That will put everything (depending on where you put the device statement)
on the CPU, but not necessarily on the right worker. If it works for you,
great, but it may not be doing what you want.

body:
I've been emailing Martin Wicke and Magnus Hyttsten. drpngx on the boards
recommended that I make it a feature request.

I've attached the conversation:

That will put everything (depending on where you put the device statement)
on the CPU, but not necessarily on the right worker. If it works for you,
great, but it may not be doing what you want.
